title: Mr. Penn
description: Warning: NOT FOR EVERYONEThis short story contains explicit male/male sexual exploits, torture, and twisted family morals.Mr. Penn is my butler. He's taken care of me since the day I was born.The son he'd never had, he likes to think of me as.He'll take care of me until his very last breath.All I ask for in return is that I get to break him.
author: L. Washington
